DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Course of Disease Assessment European Treatment Outcome Study Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The European Treatment Outcome Study Score value measured, assigned or computed related to the clinical course of disease assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A term that refers to the nature and/or clinical outcome of a disease (e.g., acute or chronic disease, aggressive or indolent disease, recurrent disease, etc.)._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.preferredName: European Treatment Outcome Study Score Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A method for assessing prognosis for patients with chronic myeloid leukemia. Patients are classified as a high or low risk on the basis of the percentage of basophils in the peripheral blood and spleen size at diagnosis._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
